title: Integrations
subtitle: You can link your Stooa account with other applications and services to log in faster, access links more conveniently, and enjoy many other benefits.

hubspot.title: Hubspot
hubspot.syncActionModalTitle: Are you sure you want to sync all contacts?
hubspot.syncActionModalBody: All contacts of the registered participants who have attended a Fishbowl organized by you will be synchronized.
hubspot.unsyncActionModalTitle: Are you sure you want to unlink your Hubspot account?
hubspot.unsyncActionModalBody: You will still be able to view the contacts loaded in Hubspot, but they will not be updated.
